title: My only beef with vayne
body:
Is that she has a knockback/stun.

Her 2 second tumble, decent range, and ability to go stealth numerous times on demand is sufficient considering her unmatched single target damage among ADCs. If someone actually does jump her ass, she should pay dearly for it.

"Vayne is squishy git gud, vayne needs peel, vayne needs this and that and this"

Ha, she is a hell of a lot more self sufficient than many other hypercarries: {{champion:222}} {{champion:29}} {{champion:96}} who have no viable form of self peel or stealth or great amounts of spammable mobility. Twitch has his stealth I guess but once he's out of it or someone jumps his ass he wont be going stealth anymore, he'll just pop.

I could care less if everything else about vayne stayed the same, so long as that condemn is reworked. She has so many tools to be an asshole in a 1v1, a mini tristana ult on a basic ability isnt something she needs.

Thats my http://jbssa.com/images/our-business/beef/cutout-beef.jpg

replies.body: I was just thinking last night they could at least make condemn a skillshot.  She's one of the few (only?) adc's that are entirely point and click.
Haha thank you.  Guess my point is valid then!

The problem with that would be making the projectile noticeable (and not really ugly looking).  Also, then we have to determine if it can hit minions or not, and of course we would have to determine the projectiles speed.

The stun part itself already is basically a skill-shot in and of itself, so adding another on top of that, might be overcomplicating things.
All that said, personally I think they should outright remove condemn and give her something different in its place.  She really doesn't need more self peel in her kit than she already has, and removing it might help fix her kit (although then we would have to decide what to replace it with, and that would be quite difficult).
